<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This datasets maps tidal flats globally, derived with 707,528 Landsat acquisitions. These acquisitions were classified using Machine learning thorugh Google Earth Engine.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`tidalFlats`|Per-pixel percent cover of tidal flats|
